mapper.select: select promotion_mpu.id, promotion_id promotionId, promotion_mpu.mpu, discount, name, price, state, sprice, model, brand, image from promotion_mpu LEFT JOIN aoyi_prod_index on promotion_mpu.mpu = aoyi_prod_index.mpu where promotion_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.delete: delete from promotion_mpu where mpu = #{skuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and promotion_id = #{promotionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into promotion_mpu (id, promotion_id, mpu, discount) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{promotionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{skuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{discount,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
